text: The NHS Alliance was a National Health Service group, which is made up of doctors, hospital managers and others working in health care in England, Scotland and Wales in the United Kingdom. It is not a part of the government or a political party. It held an annual conference. Dr Michael Dixon was Chairman of NHS Alliance since 1998, with Michael Sobanja as its Chief Executive. ==Other websites== *NHS Alliance website ==References== Category:Medical and health organisations in the United Kingdom
title: NHS Alliance
